item.description:
Food first -- meet at the Water Cafe at 6:30. After enjoying food and/or drinks on the terrace with a view of the harbor, we'll wander through the usual weird, wonderful, and challenging stuff -
http://www.icaboston....

"Visit on Free Fun Friday!
Friday, August 20, 10 am - 9 pm
The ICA partners with the Highland Street Foundation to make an entire day at the museum free of charge to everyone. Bring the family and enjoy art on the harbor free of charge on a summer day!"
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby. I'm 6'2', bearded, easy to spot!
item.name: Free (and a bit freaky!) Friday night at the ICA
